import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function LoginSignup() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); return (

{isLogin ? "Login" : "Sign Up"}

{!isLogin && ( )}

{isLogin ? "Don’t have an account?" : "Already have an account?"}{" "}

); }
